positions.title: Director, Business Development
positions.description: Solar Design Associates is a leader in the integration of renewable energy systems for buildings. Over 30 years, the interdisciplinary firm has earned an international reputation for the pioneering integration of renewable energy systems – especially photovoltaics – with buildings. Our projects include: the Bullitt Center in Seattle- the most sustainable commercial building on the US, the only member owner community shared solar garden in Harvard Mass, 1st solar-powered Olympics, the US Mission to the UN, the SF Giants Stadium, the 1st solar-powered neighborhood, the 1st zero-energy, solar-powered residence, the 1st zero-energy college academic building, the 1st wind-powered college campus and three solar systems at the White House.

positions.title: Solar Project Developer
positions.description:
SolarPowerPartners (now NRG Solar) was one of the premier solar photovoltaic power purchase agreement providers in the US with over 37 installed projects and over 12.8 MW installed solar capacity. By establishing a third party financing system over a long term 20 year contract, many non profit institutions and commercial businesses can lock in lower fixed electric rates using on site solar electric systems. SPP will install, finance, operate, maintain, monitor, and warranty all system components of a state of the art photovoltaic installation in return for a monthly payment equal or less than the conventional power grid charges by using federal & state tax incentives and renewable energy credits. As a project developer, I am searching for potential clients with viable sites and an interest in adding a sustainable energy resource to improve their bottom line.
